All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppConfig
This is a configuration class for the API, setting up user authentication, protected and unprotected endpoints, and CORS.
DbConfig
This class configures database connectivity details.
FunctionsController
 
FunctionsService
 
IsLoggedInResponse
 
JwtAuthenticationFilter
 
JwtConstants
 
LoginController
This class is a controller class that is responsible for user login.
LoginForm
This class is a normal Java object consisting of the necessary fields from the login form in the web application.
LoginResponse
This is a normal Java class that includes all details that must be returned to the web application upon processing a user login request.
LogoutController
This class is a controller class that catches requests to log a user out.
PasswordEncoderConfig
This class is a configuration class that creates is responsible for initializing the BCryptPasswordEncoder bean.
QueryableById
 
RegistrationController
This class is responsible for accepting user registration requests.
RegistrationForm
This class is a normal Java object includes the details from the registration form in the web application.
RegistrationResponse
This class is a normal Java object that includes all details that must be sent in as a response to the web applications request.
RegistrationService
This class is a service that is responsible for handling the business logic for registering a new user.
Role
 
RoleDao
 
RoleEnum
 
SimpleBankApiApplication
 
Tab
This class is a normal Java object that contains the information for each navigation bar tab.
TabsController
This class is a controller that handles requests for obtaining the correct tabs.
TabsService
This class is a service that contains the logic that finds the correct set of navigation bar tabs depending on login status and user authorities.
